meanings: (선거에) [명사] election, [동사] be elected, win (an election), (Am) carry (an election)
(심사·공모 등에) [동사] win a prize, be picked as a winner

vlive.korean: [프로후보 같지만 당선된 적은 없는 임에리얼] 진짜로? [Never been elected as a class president] Really? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 다름은 사람인가요? 아니요. 요정입니다🧚‍♀ (Yeoreum&Dayoung giving out spoiler)
vlive.english: [Never been elected as a class president] Really?

vlive.korean: 당선되셨어요, 애교에. - 살았다. You've been selected to be winsome. - Thank God. 듣기 View video 구구단(gugudan) : 구구단, 순수 뀨냥이의 반전 대폭발
vlive.english: You've been selected to be winsome. - Thank God.

vlive.korean: [현재 모두 1표씩 단장 당선자는 누구~?!] [Currently one vote each. Who will it be?!] View video V WEB DRAMA : [3화] 이거 실화? 극한직업 아이돌 연습생 스토리
vlive.english: [Currently one vote each. Who will it be?!]

vlive.korean: 전 미스코리아 당선된 줄 알았어요, 방금. 너무 예쁘게 말을 잘해주셔서. She spoke so nicely that I thought I was watching Miss Korea's speech for a second. 듣기 View video Apink : [REPLAY] 2017 GLOBAL V LIVE TOP10 - Apink
vlive.english: She spoke so nicely that I thought I was watching Miss Korea's speech for a second.

vlive.korean: 당선품은 페이스북에서 확인해 주세요. - 많은 참여 부탁드립니다. Check the winner on Facebook. - We await for your participation. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : MATILDA - 마틸다 '여름을 준비하는 마틸다의 올바른 자세는?'
vlive.english: Check the winner on Facebook. - We await for your participation.

examples.korean: He scraped in with 180 votes. 발음듣기 그는 180표를 얻어 간신히 당선되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He scraped in with 180 votes. 발음

examples.korean: We welcome his election as president. 발음듣기 그 분의 대통령 당선을 환영합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We welcome his election as president. 발음

examples.korean: He was elected by a handsome majority. 발음듣기 그는 큰 차를 두고 당선되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was elected by a handsome majority. 발음

examples.korean: She was elected by/with a majority of 749. 발음듣기 그녀는 749표 차이로 당선되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was elected by/with a majority of 749. 발음

examples.korean: a year after her election to the committee 발음듣기 그녀가 그 위원회에 (위원으로) 당선된 1년 후 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a year after her election to the committee 발음
